PermissionsModifyDataClassification.description: View and modify field-level data classification metadata.

PermissionsModifyMetadata.name: PermissionsModifyMetadata
PermissionsModifyMetadata.label: Modify Metadata Through Metadata API Functions
PermissionsModifyMetadata.description: Create, read, edit, and delete org metadata. Users must have appropriate access rights to the metadata they're trying to modify. Be careful if delegating this permission. Some metadata executes in system context, when object permissions, field-level security, and sharing rules that apply to the user are ignored. For example, Apex executes in system context.

PermissionsTwoFactorApi.name: PermissionsTwoFactorApi
PermissionsTwoFactorApi.label: Multi-Factor Authentication for API Logins
PermissionsTwoFactorApi.description: Require users to enter a code from a time-based one-time password (TOTP) authenticator app instead of the emailed security token in the API.

PermissionsForceTwoFactor.name: PermissionsForceTwoFactor
PermissionsForceTwoFactor.label: Multi-Factor Authentication for User Interface Logins
PermissionsForceTwoFactor.description: Require users to provide an additional verification method in addition to their username and password when logging in to Salesforce orgs.

PermissionsOmnichannelInventorySync.name: PermissionsOmnichannelInventorySync
PermissionsOmnichannelInventorySync.label: Omnichannel Inventory Sync
PermissionsOmnichannelInventorySync.description: Sync inventory using the Omnichannel Inventory Service APIs.

PermissionsPasswordNeverExpires.name: PermissionsPasswordNeverExpires
PermissionsPasswordNeverExpires.label: Password Never Expires
PermissionsPasswordNeverExpires.description: Prevent the user's password from expiring.

PermissionsFeedPinning.name: PermissionsFeedPinning
PermissionsFeedPinning.label: Pin Posts in Feeds
PermissionsFeedPinning.description: Assign permission to pin a post in this org and your Experience Cloud sites.

PermissionsQuipMetricsAccess.name: PermissionsQuipMetricsAccess
PermissionsQuipMetricsAccess.label: Quip Metrics
PermissionsQuipMetricsAccess.description: Allows users to access Quip metrics.

PermissionsQuipUserEngagementMetrics.name: PermissionsQuipUserEngagementMetrics
PermissionsQuipUserEngagementMetrics.label: Quip User Engagement Metrics
PermissionsQuipUserEngagementMetrics.description: Allow users to access Quip user engagement metrics.

PermissionsLtngPromoReserved01UserPerm.name: PermissionsLtngPromoReserved01UserPerm
PermissionsLtngPromoReserved01UserPerm.label: Remain in Salesforce Classic
PermissionsLtngPromoReserved01UserPerm.description: Gives the user ability to remain in Salesforce Classic instead of being switched to Lightning Experience automatically.

PermissionsRemoveDirectMessageMembers.name: PermissionsRemoveDirectMessageMembers
PermissionsRemoveDirectMessageMembers.label: Remove People from Direct Messages
PermissionsRemoveDirectMessageMembers.description: Lets a user remove others from direct messages the user is in.

PermissionsNewReportBuilder.name: PermissionsNewReportBuilder
PermissionsNewReportBuilder.label: Report Builder
PermissionsNewReportBuilder.description: Create, edit, and delete reports using the classic report builder interface.

PermissionsCreateReportInLightning.name: PermissionsCreateReportInLightning
PermissionsCreateReportInLightning.label: Report Builder (Lightning Experience)
PermissionsCreateReportInLightning.description: Create, edit, and delete reports using the enhanced report builder interface. Only available in Lightning Experience.

PermissionsRunFlow.name: PermissionsRunFlow
PermissionsRunFlow.label: Run Flows
PermissionsRunFlow.description: In this org, run any active flow. In Experience Builder sites, run any active flow that’s distributed with the Flow Lightning component.

PermissionsIsotopeLEX.name: PermissionsIsotopeLEX
PermissionsIsotopeLEX.label: Salesforce Anywhere in Lightning Experience
PermissionsIsotopeLEX.description: Use Salesforce Anywhere in Lightning Experience

PermissionsIsotopeAccess.name: PermissionsIsotopeAccess
PermissionsIsotopeAccess.label: Salesforce Anywhere on Mobile
PermissionsIsotopeAccess.description: Use the Salesforce Anywhere mobile app

PermissionsNativeWebviewScrolling.name: PermissionsNativeWebviewScrolling
PermissionsNativeWebviewScrolling.label: Salesforce Mobile App: Native scrolling on webviews
PermissionsNativeWebviewScrolling.description: Replace ui:scroller with native scrolling on webviews. Users experience smoother scrolling.

PermissionsScheduleReports.name: PermissionsScheduleReports
PermissionsScheduleReports.label: Schedule Reports
PermissionsScheduleReports.description: Schedule report refreshes in Salesforce Classic, and send email notifications that include refreshed reports in HTML format. Your organization's data may be saved and/or processed by third-party services, and Salesforce is not responsible for data users choose to send outside of Salesforce.

PermissionsSelectFilesFromSalesforce.name: PermissionsSelectFilesFromSalesforce
PermissionsSelectFilesFromSalesforce.label: Select Files from Salesforce
PermissionsSelectFilesFromSalesforce.description: Selecting a Salesforce file is an option when attaching a file.

PermissionsSendAnnouncementEmails.name: PermissionsSendAnnouncementEmails
PermissionsSendAnnouncementEmails.label: Send announcement emails
PermissionsSendAnnouncementEmails.description: Allows email notifications to be sent when a user posts an announcement.

PermissionsSendCustomNotifications.name: PermissionsSendCustomNotifications
PermissionsSendCustomNotifications.label: Send Custom Notifications
PermissionsSendCustomNotifications.description: Trigger the Send Custom Notification action in flows that run in user context, REST API calls, and Apex callouts.

PermissionsEmailSingle.name: PermissionsEmailSingle
PermissionsEmailSingle.label: Send Email
PermissionsEmailSingle.description: Send email to a single contact or lead.

PermissionsTransactionalEmailSend.name: PermissionsTransactionalEmailSend
PermissionsTransactionalEmailSend.label: Send Non-Commercial Email
PermissionsTransactionalEmailSend.description: Send non-commercial end-user emails to contacts, leads, and person accounts who opt out of email or who choose Don't Market in data privacy records. This permission doesn't apply to the Cases email action, Lightning Experience list email, or Salesforce Classic mass email.

PermissionsEnableNotifications.name: PermissionsEnableNotifications
PermissionsEnableNotifications.label: Send Outbound Messages
PermissionsEnableNotifications.description: Send outbound messages to an external Web service API.

PermissionsEnableCommunityAppLauncher.name: PermissionsEnableCommunityAppLauncher
PermissionsEnableCommunityAppLauncher.label: Show App Launcher in Experience Cloud Sites
PermissionsEnableCommunityAppLauncher.description: Display the App Launcher icon in Experience Cloud sites.

PermissionsShowCompanyNameAsUserBadge.name: PermissionsShowCompanyNameAsUserBadge
PermissionsShowCompanyNameAsUserBadge.label: Show Company Name as Site Role
PermissionsShowCompanyNameAsUserBadge.description: Allow users to see other users' company name in site role.

PermissionsCustomSidebarOnAllPages.name: PermissionsCustomSidebarOnAllPages
PermissionsCustomSidebarOnAllPages.label: Show Custom Sidebar On All Pages
PermissionsCustomSidebarOnAllPages.description: Display a custom sidebar on all pages in Salesforce.com.

PermissionsSkipIdentityConfirmation.name: PermissionsSkipIdentityConfirmation
PermissionsSkipIdentityConfirmation.label: Skip Device Activation at Login
PermissionsSkipIdentityConfirmation.description: Allow a Salesforce Customer Support representative to log in to this org without verifying their identity in order to troubleshoot an issue.

PermissionsSubscribeToLightningDashboard.name: PermissionsSubscribeToLightningDashboards
PermissionsSubscribeToLightningDashboard.label: Subscribe to Dashboards
PermissionsSubscribeToLightningDashboard.description: Subscribe to dashboards in Lightning Experience to schedule dashboard refreshes and send notifications by email. Your organization's data may be saved and/or processed by third-party services, and Salesforce is not responsible for data users choose to send outside of Salesforce.

PermissionsSubscribeDashboardToOtherUser.name: PermissionsSubscribeDashboardToOtherUsers
PermissionsSubscribeDashboardToOtherUser.label: Subscribe to Dashboards: Add Recipients
PermissionsSubscribeDashboardToOtherUser.description: Specify recipients of email notifications from dashboard subscriptions in Lightning Experience. All recipient email addresses appear in the subscription email's "to:" field, so subscription email recipients will be able to see each other's email addresses regardless of User Sharing settings.

PermissionsSubscribeDashboardRolesGrps.name: PermissionsSubscribeDashboardRolesGrps
PermissionsSubscribeDashboardRolesGrps.label: Subscribe to Dashboards: Send to Groups and Roles
PermissionsSubscribeDashboardRolesGrps.description: Set public groups and roles as recipients of dashboard subscriptions in Lightning Experience.

PermissionsSubscribeToLightningReports.name: PermissionsSubscribeToLightningReports
PermissionsSubscribeToLightningReports.label: Subscribe to Reports
PermissionsSubscribeToLightningReports.description: Subscribe to reports in Lightning Experience to schedule report refreshes and send notifications by email. Your organization's data may be saved and/or processed by third-party services, and Salesforce is not responsible for data users choose to send outside of Salesforce.

PermissionsSubscribeReportToOtherUsers.name: PermissionsSubscribeReportToOtherUsers
PermissionsSubscribeReportToOtherUsers.label: Subscribe to Reports: Add Recipients
PermissionsSubscribeReportToOtherUsers.description: Specify recipients of email notifications from report subscriptions in Lightning Experience. All recipient email addresses appear in the subscription email's "to:" field, so subscription email recipients will be able to see other's email addresses regardless of User Sharing settings.

PermissionsSubscribeReportRolesGrps.name: PermissionsSubscribeReportRolesGrps
PermissionsSubscribeReportRolesGrps.label: Subscribe to Reports: Send to Groups and Roles
PermissionsSubscribeReportRolesGrps.description: Set public groups and roles as recipients of report subscriptions in Lightning Experience.

PermissionsSubscribeReportsRunAsUser.name: PermissionsSubscribeReportsRunAsUser
PermissionsSubscribeReportsRunAsUser.label: Subscribe to Reports: Set Running User
PermissionsSubscribeReportsRunAsUser.description: Specify who report subscription recipients see report data as. The specified person's data access determines what data the report displays.

PermissionsSandboxTestingInCommunityApp.name: PermissionsSandboxTestingInCommunityApp
PermissionsSandboxTestingInCommunityApp.label: Test Sandboxes in Mobile Publisher for Experience Cloud
PermissionsSandboxTestingInCommunityApp.description: Allows testing a sandbox experience in the mobile publisher for Experience Cloud.

PermissionsTransferAnyEntity.name: PermissionsTransferAnyEntity
PermissionsTransferAnyEntity.label: Transfer Record
PermissionsTransferAnyEntity.description: Change the owner of most records.

PermissionsConsentApiUpdate.name: PermissionsConsentApiUpdate
PermissionsConsentApiUpdate.label: Update Consent Preferences Using REST API
PermissionsConsentApiUpdate.description: Use the PATCH method on the Consent REST API resource to update consent preferences.

PermissionsPublishPackaging.name: PermissionsPublishPackaging
PermissionsPublishPackaging.label: Upload AppExchange Packages
PermissionsPublishPackaging.description: Upload packages to AppExchange for distribution.

PermissionsIdentityEnabled.name: PermissionsIdentityEnabled
PermissionsIdentityEnabled.label: Use Identity Features
PermissionsIdentityEnabled.description: Gives the user access to Identity features such as App Launcher.

PermissionsUseOmnichannelInventoryAPIs.name: PermissionsUseOmnichannelInventoryAPIs
PermissionsUseOmnichannelInventoryAPIs.label: Use Omnichannel Inventory APIs
PermissionsUseOmnichannelInventoryAPIs.description: Manage inventory using the Omnichannel Inventory Service APIs.

PermissionsUseAddOrderItemSummaryAPIs.name: PermissionsUseAddOrderItemSummaryAPIs
PermissionsUseAddOrderItemSummaryAPIs.label: Use Order Management Add Order Item Summary APIs
PermissionsUseAddOrderItemSummaryAPIs.description: Call the Order Management Add Order Item Summary APIs. Required for product exchanges.

PermissionsUseReturnOrderAPIs.name: PermissionsUseReturnOrderAPIs
PermissionsUseReturnOrderAPIs.label: Use Order Management Return APIs
PermissionsUseReturnOrderAPIs.description: Allows a user to call the Order Management Return Order APIs.

PermissionsUseReturnOrder.name: PermissionsUseReturnOrder
PermissionsUseReturnOrder.label: Use Order Management Return Order
PermissionsUseReturnOrder.description: Allows a user to access the Order Management Return Order Objects.

PermissionsUseRepricing.name: PermissionsUseRepricing
PermissionsUseRepricing.label: Use Repricing Objects and APIs
PermissionsUseRepricing.description: Allow access to order product repricing features.

PermissionsCanVerifyComment.name: PermissionsCanVerifyComment
PermissionsCanVerifyComment.label: Verify Answers to Chatter Questions
PermissionsCanVerifyComment.description: Mark answers to Chatter questions as verified.

PermissionsAIViewInsightObjects.name: PermissionsAIViewInsightObjects
PermissionsAIViewInsightObjects.label: View AI Insight Objects
PermissionsAIViewInsightObjects.description: View objects associated with AI record insights, including the insight, value, reason, and feedback.

PermissionsViewAllCustomSettings.name: PermissionsViewAllCustomSettings
PermissionsViewAllCustomSettings.label: View All Custom Settings
PermissionsViewAllCustomSettings.description: Let users view all custom setting data directly and via the API.

PermissionsViewAllData.name: PermissionsViewAllData
PermissionsViewAllData.label: View All Data
PermissionsViewAllData.description: View all organizational data, regardless of sharing settings.

PermissionsViewAllForeignKeyNames.name: PermissionsViewAllForeignKeyNames
PermissionsViewAllForeignKeyNames.label: View All Lookup Record Names
PermissionsViewAllForeignKeyNames.description: View the record names in lookup fields regardless of sharing settings. Lookup fields include system fields, such as Created By and Last Modified By.

PermissionsViewUserPII.name: PermissionsViewUserPII
PermissionsViewUserPII.label: View Concealed Field Data
PermissionsViewUserPII.description: View field data, such as sensitive or personally identifiable information, that is concealed from other users.

PermissionsViewPublicDashboards.name: PermissionsViewPublicDashboards
PermissionsViewPublicDashboards.label: View Dashboards in Public Folders
PermissionsViewPublicDashboards.description: View and access dashboards in public folders, which does not include others’ personal folders.

PermissionsViewDeveloperName.name: PermissionsViewDeveloperName
PermissionsViewDeveloperName.label: View DeveloperName
PermissionsViewDeveloperName.description: View the DeveloperName field via the API.

PermissionsViewEncryptedData.name: PermissionsViewEncryptedData
PermissionsViewEncryptedData.label: View Encrypted Data
PermissionsViewEncryptedData.description: View the value of encrypted fields in plain text.

PermissionsViewEventLogFiles.name: PermissionsViewEventLogFiles
PermissionsViewEventLogFiles.label: View Event Log Files
PermissionsViewEventLogFiles.description: Get CSV event log files via the API.

PermissionsViewFlowUsageAndFlowEventData.name: PermissionsViewFlowUsageAndFlowEventData
PermissionsViewFlowUsageAndFlowEventData.label: View Flow Usage and Flow Event Data
PermissionsViewFlowUsageAndFlowEventData.description: Unsupported. Use the View Setup and Configuration permission to let users access flow usage data and flow standard platform event data.

PermissionsViewHelpLink.name: PermissionsViewHelpLink
PermissionsViewHelpLink.label: View Help Link
PermissionsViewHelpLink.description: Allow user to view help link.

PermissionsViewPlatformEvents.name: PermissionsViewPlatformEvents
PermissionsViewPlatformEvents.label: View Login Forensics Events
PermissionsViewPlatformEvents.description: Query Login Forensics events using the API.

PermissionsViewMyTeamsDashboards.name: PermissionsViewMyTeamsDashboards
PermissionsViewMyTeamsDashboards.label: View My Team's Dashboards
PermissionsViewMyTeamsDashboards.description: View dashboards owned by people under them in the role hierarchy.

PermissionsViewDataLeakageEvents.name: PermissionsViewDataLeakageEvents
PermissionsViewDataLeakageEvents.label: View Real-Time Event Monitoring Data
PermissionsViewDataLeakageEvents.description: Query Real-Time Event Monitoring Data using the API.

PermissionsViewPublicReports.name: PermissionsViewPublicReports
PermissionsViewPublicReports.label: View Reports in Public Folders
PermissionsViewPublicReports.description: View and access reports in public folders, which does not include others’ personal folders.

PermissionsViewRoles.name: PermissionsViewRoles
PermissionsViewRoles.label: View Roles and Role Hierarchy
PermissionsViewRoles.description: Allow user to view roles and role hierarchy.

PermissionsViewSecurityCommandCenter.name: PermissionsViewSecurityCommandCenter
PermissionsViewSecurityCommandCenter.label: View Security Center pages
PermissionsViewSecurityCommandCenter.description: View the Security Health check page, and all pages in Security Center except the Connected Tenants page.

PermissionsViewSetup.name: PermissionsViewSetup
PermissionsViewSetup.label: View Setup and Configuration
PermissionsViewSetup.description: View the App Setup and Administrative Settings pages.

PermissionsViewAnomalyEvents.name: PermissionsViewAnomalyEvents
PermissionsViewAnomalyEvents.label: View Threat Detection Events
PermissionsViewAnomalyEvents.description: Allows user to view the threat detection events.

PermissionsBypassMFAForUiLogins.name: PermissionsBypassMFAForUiLogins
PermissionsBypassMFAForUiLogins.label: Waive Multi-Factor Authentication for Exempt Users
PermissionsBypassMFAForUiLogins.description: Disable MFA challenges on direct UI logins for users or orgs that aren’t required by Salesforce to use multi-factor authentication, per the Salesforce Trust and Compliance Documentation. This permission overrides the Multi-Factor Authentication for User Interface Logins user permission and the Require multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all direct UI logins to your Salesforce org setting.

PermissionsDataExport.name: PermissionsDataExport
PermissionsDataExport.label: Weekly Data Export
PermissionsDataExport.description: Run the weekly data export service.

PermissionsManageIpAddresses.name: PermissionsManageIpAddresses
PermissionsManageIpAddresses.label: Manage IP Addresses
PermissionsManageIpAddresses.description: Create, edit, and delete trusted IP ranges.

PermissionsManageLoginAccessPolicies.name: PermissionsManageLoginAccessPolicies
PermissionsManageLoginAccessPolicies.label: Manage Login Access Policies
PermissionsManageLoginAccessPolicies.description: Specify the login access policies that apply to administrators and support organizations.

PermissionsManagePasswordPolicies.name: PermissionsManagePasswordPolicies
PermissionsManagePasswordPolicies.label: Manage Password Policies
PermissionsManagePasswordPolicies.description: Set password restrictions and login lockout policies for all users.

PermissionsManageProfilesPermissionsets.name: PermissionsManageProfilesPermissionsets
PermissionsManageProfilesPermissionsets.label: Manage Profiles and Permission Sets
PermissionsManageProfilesPermissionsets.description: Create, edit, and delete profiles and permission sets.

PermissionsManageSharing.name: PermissionsManageSharing
PermissionsManageSharing.label: Manage Sharing
PermissionsManageSharing.description: Create, edit, and recalculate sharing rules, edit organization-wide defaults, and enable the external sharing model.

PermissionsManageUsers.name: PermissionsManageUsers
PermissionsManageUsers.label: Manage Users
PermissionsManageUsers.description: Create, edit, and deactivate users, and manage security settings, including profiles and roles.

PermissionsResetPasswords.name: PermissionsResetPasswords
PermissionsResetPasswords.label: Reset User Passwords and Unlock Users
PermissionsResetPasswords.description: Unlock users whose accounts are locked, and reset user passwords.

PermissionsViewAllProfiles.name: PermissionsViewAllProfiles
PermissionsViewAllProfiles.label: View All Profiles
PermissionsViewAllProfiles.description: View all user profiles, regardless of profile filtering setting.

PermissionsViewAllUsers.name: PermissionsViewAllUsers
PermissionsViewAllUsers.label: View All Users
PermissionsViewAllUsers.description: View all users, regardless of sharing settings.
